statements: SELECT * FROM coverage_details WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, coverage_type, premium_amount FROM coverage_details WHERE coverage_type = 'Health';
SELECT coverage_type, coverage_start_date, coverage_end_date FROM coverage_details WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM coverage_details WHERE coverage_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, coverage_type, premium_amount, coverage_start_date, coverage_end_date FROM coverage_details ORDER BY coverage_start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, coverage_type, premium_amount, coverage_start_date, coverage_end_date FROM coverage_details WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM coverage_details WHERE coverage_type = 'Health';
SELECT user_id, coverage_type, premium_amount FROM coverage_details WHERE coverage_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND coverage_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT coverage_type, coverage_start_date, coverage_end_date FROM coverage_details WHERE premium_amount > 5000 ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, coverage_type, premium_amount FROM coverage_details WHERE coverage_type IN ('Health', 'Life') AND premium_amount < 10000 ORDER BY coverage_start_date ASC, premium_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM coverage_details WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, coverage_amount FROM coverage_details WHERE coverage_start_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, coverage_amount, coverage_start_date, coverage_end_date FROM coverage_details ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount, status FROM claim_histories WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT coverage_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim_histories ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM coverage_details WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY coverage_start_date DESC;
SELECT id, coverage_amount FROM coverage_details WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM coverage_details WHERE coverage_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT c.id, ch.claim_date, ch.claim_amount FROM coverage_details c JOIN claim_histories ch ON c.id = ch.coverage_id WHERE ch.status = 'approved';
SELECT user_id, SUM(coverage_amount) AS total_coverage FROM coverage_details GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_coverage > 10000;
SELECT * FROM coverage_details;
SELECT coverage_id, coverage_amount FROM coverage_details WHERE coverage_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, coverage_amount, coverage_end_date FROM coverage_details ORDER BY coverage_end_date DESC;
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim_histories WHERE resolved = false;
SELECT premium_amount, payment_date FROM premiums WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM coverage_details WHERE coverage_amount > 1000 ORDER BY coverage_start_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT coverage_id, coverage_start_date, insurer_id FROM coverage_details INNER JOIN insurers ON coverage_details.insurer_id = insurers.insurer_id WHERE insurers.name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY coverage_amount ASC;
SELECT insurer_id, COUNT(user_id) AS user_count FROM coverage_details GROUP BY insurer_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, coverage_amount FROM claim_histories JOIN coverage_details ON claim_histories.coverage_id = coverage_details.coverage_id WHERE claim_amount > coverage_amount * 0.5;
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' AND premium_amount > 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, user_address FROM users;
SELECT user_id, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name = 'John';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_address FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_address LIKE '%Ave%'
SELECT user_name FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC
SELECT user_id, coverage_amount FROM coverage_details WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_status FROM claim_histories WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-07-31'
SELECT user_name, user_email, claim_status FROM users JOIN claim_histories ON users.user_id = claim_histories.user_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM coverage_details ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, protocol_name, premium_amount FROM premiums WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT protocol_name, claim_date, claim_status FROM claim_histories WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM coverage_details WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, protocol_name, coverage_amount FROM coverage_details WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT u.name, c.coverage_amount, p.premium_amount FROM users u JOIN coverage_details c ON u.id = c.user_id JOIN premiums p ON u.id = p.user_id WHERE u.name = 'John Doe';
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount, MIN(claim_amount) AS min_claim_amount FROM claim_histories WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT protocol_name FROM coverage_details ORDER BY protocol_name ASC;
